str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.
An offering, sacrifice. From prosphero; presentation; concretely, an oblation or sacrifice.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From teleios; to complete, i.e. accomplish, or consummate.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
Neuter of a compound of dia and a derivative of an alternate of phero; carried through, i.e. perpetually.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: From hagios; to make holy, i.e. purify or consecrate; to venerate.
